description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget called HomeScreen, which represents the main discovery page of a mobile app. It includes UI components such as headers, search bar, category filters, and horizontally scrollable carousels for trending books and new arrivals, utilizing mock data and custom widgets.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that renders the main discovery interface with search, categories, and featured book carousels.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget, returning an instance of _HomeScreenState.

methods.name: _goSearch
methods.description: Handles search submission by navigating to the listing page with current category filter.

methods.name: _filterCategory
methods.description: Filters a list of books based on the selected category.

methods.name: _trending
methods.description: Generates a shuffled list of trending books, limited to 14 items, using mock data.

methods.name: _newArrivals
methods.description: Returns a list of new arrival books filtered by category.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product detail page for the specified book.
